alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Macon; Rutherford; Smith; Trousdale; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Smith, north central Rutherford, southwestern Jackson, central Wilson, southeastern Macon and central Trousdale Counties through 830 AM CST... At 745 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Belinda City, or 8 miles south of Lebanon, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Carthage, Hartsville, Watertown, Gordonsville, Walterhill, South Carthage, Tuckers Crossroads, Dixon Springs, Pleasant Shade, Dickerson Chapel Recreation Area, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Granville and Gladeville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 232 and 258. Interstate 840 between mile markers 63 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson; Macon; Rutherford; Smith; Trousdale; Wilson
